website_summaries.verdict: High-quality chocolate coconut-flavored powder that’s offered at a low price per ounce.
pros: Delivers 24 grams of protein per serving, making it a smart muscle-building protein powder
To help with fast muscle recovery, it contains 5.5 grams of BCAAs
Very low in fat, calories, and carbs per serving
Has a texture that works well for mixing with any kind of liquid
cons: Some people no longer like the taste after a recent formula change

customer_reviews.title: wont purchase this flavor ever again
customer_reviews.text: I love ON double chocolate protein powder; drink it everyday. Decide to change flavor to the chocolate coconut and big mistake. First, there was a white powder in the container (thought it was coconut powder) so mixed it all together plus the scoop was at the very bottom so had to find it. It had a awful taste which 20 mins late I started to vomit; messed up my stomach for hours. Will never purchase this flavor again.. . Exp date is 2018,
customer_reviews.author: PPA

customer_reviews.title: If you dont put in work dont expect muscles.
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate coconut rocks iv used damn near all of the optimum nutrition whey protein never disappoints me. Some flavors blend differently but its expected. Nutritional facts vary so dont think ur getting ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Love ON supplements, choco-coco good on occasion
customer_reviews.text: I trust ON supplements and have used them since HS. Chocolate protein gets boring, tried adding peanut butter, fruit etc to mix it up. Saw this new chocolate coconut flavor and gave it a try. Very sweet! Not ideal for a daily shake but good on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein
customer_reviews.text: This is very good protein! Not very much filler and they keep the cholesterol down compared to other proteins. It tastes great too. I'm a mass builder and take two of these a day, one first thing in the morning and another immediately after my workout. My post workout shake I add one teaspoon of creatine (unflavored same company) and a heaping teaspoon of peanut butter and I take it with milk while bulking. It mixes perfectly in my shaker cups. I have notable results with this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty emergency meal
customer_reviews.text: Optimum Nutrition 100% whey chocolate coconut flavor is very good. I found it a little too sweet, but I'm not a big sweet eater. My husband loves it. The whey dissolves quickly, leaving no lumps or gritty feel. Although it's not recommended as a meal replacement....I have had a scoop, when I absolutely had no time to eat. It is filling and provides a nice level energy. I'd definitely purchase again..and would like to try other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Mort65

customer_reviews.title: Love the chocolate combined with coconut flavors! Light flavors but they stand out perfectly together!
customer_reviews.text: I tried the chocolate coconut flavor and love it! I don't like chocolate flavored things, I like my chocolate plain, so this combo with coconut is perfect! My last protein shake I ordered on Amazon (100% Whey Pro-Amino Vanilla Ice Cream 2 lbs) was delicious but I was looking for a more wallet-friendly option. My 18 yo son dipped into that 2lb container quickly :) This 5lb baby I am not worried about running out as fast. I add chia seeds and freshly ground flax seeds to my shakes. When a handful of frozen fruit is added is is absolutely heavenly. I am going to try other flavors too. I think it's a great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: N. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Best protein flavor yet
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein I have ever had. Not only has optimum nutrition been my go to for the past couple years after trial and error with different brands but this flavor is amazing. Just the perfect mix of coconut and chocolate. I’ve seen some reviews that made me skeptical but I love it. No fake flavor at all. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Bad Batch
customer_reviews.text: I received the product on time through Amazon, I have used this brand before. The product tastes great and mixes smoothly with water or milk. However, once I finished my previous bottle of protein powered and switched to this one I started having horrible stomach pains immediately after consumption. I'm unsure if I am reacting to an ingredient in this specific batch or the flavor mix/ type of protein I received this time. Is there any way I can exchange my bottle for another flavor after opening it?
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Very Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I had only ever purchased the double-chocolate (which tastes like Nestle Quick). So when I decided to give this flavor a shot, I was happy it wasn't an overly sweet coconut flavor (like a Mounds candy bar can be). It's still coconut-y (?) but not overdone. If you like chocolate and coconut, you'll enjoy this. I really enjoy ON's Gold Standard 100% Whey protein. It really works for me. The amino acids blunt that lactic acid build-up that causes so much of the soreness after a good day at the gym. Consider their creatine to add to your post-workout shake.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand for protein powder. I like all the flavors but this flavor and banana are my best.
customer_reviews.author: batuhan

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I don't like most of Optimum Nutrition's flavors, so I was very hesitant to try this one for the first time (and I ordered the 5 pounds one, this was kind of a leap of faith), and it actually tastes like chocolate and coconut mixed together, and not something which is vaguely resembles chocolate and coconuts 👍
customer_reviews.author: Shay Livyatan

customer_reviews.title: It’s protein, not much more to say
customer_reviews.text: Proteins good, thanks for continuing to make a your product Whey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best protein ever! Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: My favorite protein, it’s so good that it feel like you’re cheating.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Morales

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I have found my protein shake flavor!! I will be buying this one over and over. I have had about 30 shakes from this tub and still not tired of the flavor. Mixes smoothly with a blender bottle and tastse amazing. Thank you optimum nutrition!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Brindisi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: As with the other O.N. whey proteins, this packs it in. Flavor is great, provided you like coconut (duh!). I will admit to having never used any O.N. whey with water; only almond, soy, or skim milk, all of which really make this like a shake or dessert drink. The chocolate coconut flavor is a little intense for me and a 1-to-1 ratio is too strong for my liking, so I dilute the serving just a bit. Add a banana, pineapple, and/or strawberries and you actually get close to a tiki drink!
customer_reviews.author: D. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: it is OK...
customer_reviews.text: We have had chocolate, chocolate mint and this chocolate coconut....the plain chocolate was the best. This with the coconut took a lot to get used to and I dislike the amount of artificial sugar that is in it as it does leave an aftertaste. Will be looking for another soon and hope to find some that doesn't use asulfamine or any sucralose or asparatame.....
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Ford

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t know whey protein powder could be this yummmmmy
customer_reviews.text: No after taste and not gross like other brands that I’ve tried. Coconut chocolate is probably one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good taste as well
customer_reviews.text: Dissolves very well in water with a shaker cup. I use it in conjunction with Creatine, glutamine, BCAA, and NO2 first thing in the morning before my workout. Good taste as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you like the taste of coconut this is for you you! One of the best tasting protein powders I've had. I've also never had a protien that mixes so well. It literally never clumps! I usually mix it with whole milk and after 10-15 sec of shaking it is smooth as silk! This is also my first time trying this brand so I'm assuming their other flavors mix well, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate coconut makes me go nuts
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes awesome! i love to add it to my oatmeal!
customer_reviews.author: Sargent Dude

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This is the best choice for a protein shake. Has plenty of protein and is low carb which is hard to find. Plus on Amazon the price is fantastic. I have tried 7 different flavors and Chocolate coconut and Strawberry are my favorite. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Iceprincess

customer_reviews.title: Taste is Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This one & Rocky Road are my favorites. If you like Along Joy & need your protein fix, this one is for you! Its not too sweet & mixes well with Almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: So am I crazy and I don't know how to order who using Amazon for like more then 3yrs or they are just f
customer_reviews.text: I don't know the taste, I don't know the effects of this product but I know that I order one flavor and they mess up, I ordered again, they mess it up again... So am I crazy and I don't know how to order who using Amazon for like more then 3yrs or they are just f...k up in head and don't know difference between flavors....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price, tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good price, and nice flavor. Ordered the Chocolate-Coconut flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Alieski Sarmiento

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have loved the taste and ease of mix, does have some after taste. Update I amusing this in a smoothie now mixed with frozen fruits, nutritional yeast, and coffee mixed in our nutria bullet. Works really well. I use the smoothie as a mid morning pick me up, snack or what ever you want to call it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S.

customer_reviews.title: like drinking an almond joy!
customer_reviews.text: mixes great, no clumping, and a good mix of chocolate and coconut in the flavor. always had good luck with this brand. like drinking an almond joy! also got the cake batter and it's good, not too sweet, very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: cjn

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I did a fair amount of research on protein supplements and went with this brand because of the fact that it is not heavy with chemicals or metals.
customer_reviews.author: Traxbe

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied !!
customer_reviews.text: I have two children that under Doctor's orders drink two protein shakes daily. This has been a daily struggle for four years now. We have tried several shakes out there. We have ran into problem with clumping and the children disliking the flavors. This has been the very best we have tried by far. The Children have tried and loved the Chocolate Coconut, Strawberry Banana, and Vanilla Ice Cream. These shake are very easy to mix unlike others I have tried. We are very satisfied with the flavors and product its self.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Robison

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, with out it my muscles are really sore. I'm old and have lots of health problems. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, mixes easier than the store-brand stuff I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, mixes easier than the store-brand stuff I was buying before, and it's cheaper. Nothing to dislike, yet.
customer_reviews.author: Max E

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars because I realized it wasn't the best offer at the time I purchased this product
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because I realized it wasn't the best offer at the time I purchased this product. Local Costco stores sometimes run discount on this product which saves you ~15$ for this product. Ofcourse, you'd not be able to choose from the wide variety of flavors available since Costco only carries Vanilla and Chocolate flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Tejal Nerkar

customer_reviews.title: Coconut chocolate doesn't taste bad, heavier on the chocolate with a mild hint ...
customer_reviews.text: Time and time again, ON never fails to deliver. It's been my protein powder brand of choice since I started lifting. Coconut chocolate doesn't taste bad, heavier on the chocolate with a mild hint of coconut but no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Flavor profile
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great stuff. the overall taste mixed with water was surprising. Almost didnt taste like anything. But In a good way. The flavor was super dialed back. Which i found refreshing. kinda like a muted coconut water drink with feint hints of choclate. Which i loved cuz im in more of a cutting process. With other flavors ive gotten that kinda funky diet soda sweetness taste, which i dont like. But i didnt get any of that this time around. When Mixed with milk, its fireee!! Pretty much choclate milk with a smoothe coconut finish. Luv it.
customer_reviews.author: Savage_OG

customer_reviews.title: Good smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Great in all my smoothies good smooth blending and taste
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Great taste always good product
customer_reviews.text: One of the better flavors. I was bored of the usual chocolates and not too impressed with the taste. The slight hint of coconut hasn't forced me to alter any recipe and in my opinion tastes better when mixed with water or milk compared to the standard chocolates. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisH

customer_reviews.title: WHEY is one of my best. I did research on this product before buying ...
customer_reviews.text: WHEY is one of my best. I did research on this product before buying and I am positive with the product and its result. 5 star *
customer_reviews.author: Manish k.

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY whey protein I use, it mixes up great doesn't get clumpy and the taste is very good!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste! This is my favorite flavor along with the Rocky Road from Optimum Nutrition!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Normally I get chocolate and it’s good but this flavor is not good
customer_reviews.text: This flavor clumps. Normally I get chocolate and it’s good but this flavor is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Zedhound

customer_reviews.title: ON Protein is great and this flavor is really good.
customer_reviews.text: I love ON protein and have been using it for years. The Chocolate coconut tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Coconut tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate Coconut tastes great. The best flavor that I have tried. That's all.
customer_reviews.author: V A Thiyagarajan

customer_reviews.title: Bad for stomach
customer_reviews.text: My stomach is terrible after I started to use this protein powder. 3 day I had digestive system problem and likely I lived at restroom.
customer_reviews.author: Osman kaya

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best flavor. I have tired a few and I always go back to this one.
customer_reviews.author: TravisB

customer_reviews.title: I love the vanilla ice cream flavor
customer_reviews.text: The only product I use. I love the vanilla ice cream flavor. It's my go-to!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy H

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Optimum Whey Gold Standard has always been great for me through the years. Upgrading to Prime got me to purchase through Amazon, and I was excited at seeing Chocolate Coconut as a flavor. It did not disappoint. Tastes fine with water, and delicious with milk. I often look forward to having my shake. The coconut flavor wasn't too artificial/disgusting, it just added a mellow, tropical sweetness.
customer_reviews.author: jarebear

customer_reviews.title: High quality protein powder and well trusted brand
customer_reviews.text: Double chocolate rick has 24 Gms of protein per 30.4 gms of scoop which is very good ratio of protein. Great mixability and quality. I can see the results :)
customer_reviews.author: AMZ

customer_reviews.title: Heaven
customer_reviews.text: ON Gold Standard makes amazing products, if you're reading this you probably already know this. the coconut chocolate flavor is amazing! * * Assuming you think chocolate and coconut are yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Just Saying

customer_reviews.title: Only brand I buy
customer_reviews.text: Good product; they don't change their formula drastically and doesn't have a bloat effect as do other brands. Mixes well when making shakes or just with water (ok, so there is some chunkiness left over but not as bad). I'd recommend vanilla and double chocolate. I also like Chocolate Coconut and am trying Banana Strawberry (not bad either).
customer_reviews.author: Phengerabuls

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste
customer_reviews.text: I've tried about 4 or 5 different types of protein powder along with different flavors. I really like this flavor as it sort of tastes like an almond joy if you blend it with milk. I plan on buying this flavor for as long as it is available.
customer_reviews.author: AJC

customer_reviews.title: Great Whey
customer_reviews.text: The ON Gold Standard is amongst the best whey protein powders and they have a ton of flavors to suit just about anyone. It mixes very easily in just a shaker. I love coconut, so the choco/coconut is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: J. Young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The chocolate coconut taste Great!!
customer_reviews.author: John Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor. I mix with water taste like a sugar free mounds bar.
customer_reviews.author: John-Michael Watson

customer_reviews.title: tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I love this flavor. It is by far my favorite protein powder. great deal for the price; it will last a cery long time. Tastes great with almond milk and banana or by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Hbazzzz

customer_reviews.title: Forearm Deep, and No Scoop
customer_reviews.text: Theres nothing wrong with the protein, I just don't appreciate having to go forearm deep into my protein to find out there is no scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Props for Chocolate Coconut
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to give a shoutout for the Chocolate Coconut flavor since I've not seen anyone else write about it. It used to be more expensive than the other flavors but now seems to be around the same price. It blends superbly with water and tastes great just like that. The other flavor I tried is Chocolate Mint and that one I had to mix it with milk or gag trying to drink it. Hope this helps anyone looking for a new flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Coconut Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I personally love coconut flavored anything so if you're like me, you won't mind this flavor. Don't expect to taste a lot of chocolate, though. The coconut overpowers the chocolate, making it seem more like a "Coconut with a hint of chocolate" flavor. Overall, it's got a good enough taste that I enjoy it, but it's a light enough flavor where I don't see myself getting sick of drinking this.
customer_reviews.author: Jaygetem

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Supplements!
customer_reviews.text: One of the greatest tasting proteins I've had. Tasty, mixes well, and is mostly protein. Perfect post workout if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Zepp777

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but the taste is not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: mixes great compared to cheaper brands, I just use cold water in a shaker and I never have any problems with chunks. taste is also decent.
customer_reviews.author: cuponjim

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good.
customer_reviews.text: It tastes really good. This and the chocolate mint are my favorite ON Gold Standard Whey flavors. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R5Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Favorite brand and the only flavor I'll use anymore
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this for years now. Favorite brand and the only flavor I'll use anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Real Protein
customer_reviews.text: I wonder how that got in there anyways the taste was okay not much of coconut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great nutritional value, low carbs and sugars, high quality protein content, and a huge variety of flavors. This protein mixes well and doesn't clump up. Also tastes great with water. My favorite is the double chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Mixes good taste good, quality is spot on
customer_reviews.text: This is a great protein. The flavor is awesome, it mixes well and does what its suppose to. I've bought more than 10 of these.
customer_reviews.author: Huck78

customer_reviews.title: What is not to like?
customer_reviews.text: This product is part of my daily diet. It is also a treat as I like the flavor A LOT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My bf loves this brand and this flavor is excellent. Shakes up well with cold water or almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: KYshopper

customer_reviews.title: Sweetness
customer_reviews.text: This is way too sweet. I really like coconut flavor stuff but this was just too much for me
customer_reviews.author: Jeet

customer_reviews.title: one of the best brands in the market
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on the expected date, as to the quality of it, well, it is ON, one of the best brands in the market, all their products are good, and this is not the exception.
customer_reviews.author: Yender Zambrano

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This is my most favorite protein powder, and I have tried many. It dissolves well, doesn't have a gritty, mouthy feel, and tastes great too. Amazon also has the cheapest prices anywhere I've looked.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Corbet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best protien powder I've ever used. I noticed a big jump in my gains when i switched to ON.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: I usually get chocolate mint because it was my favorite flavor to add with just water however I decided ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually get chocolate mint because it was my favorite flavor to add with just water however I decided to try out chocolate coconut and it tastes exactly like an almond joy.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great protein. Best price is on amazon for sure! by some $30.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mobile

customer_reviews.title: Happy medium
customer_reviews.text: Very good happy medium protien. PLEASE WHATEVER YOU DO, DONT TRY THE CARAMEL TOFFEE - INSTANT TICKET TO TASTEBUD HELL! Worst tasting flavor experienced. Banana cream, strawberry banana, chocolate, delicious straberry are all very good.
customer_reviews.author: Spartan116

customer_reviews.title: I think ON is somewhat overpriced due to its wide ...
customer_reviews.text: I think ON is somewhat overpriced due to its wide popularity. I would be conservative selecting new flavors as a lot of them seem dissapointing. I would go for all-time classic Vanilla and Cookies and Cream. Chocolate is somewhat weak. FYI taste is always richer when protein is mixed with milk
customer_reviews.author: Terrible Dennis

customer_reviews.title: On point with product and delivery
customer_reviews.text: It was the correct product as shown. The delivery wasn't long and just in time for me to make my shakes.
customer_reviews.author: NOX-SX

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein powder.. it tastes like a Mounds bar! So yummy. And with 24 grams of protein per scoop, you can't go wrong. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Pooja

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Probably some of the best protein powder I have tasted.
customer_reviews.author: C. Herbrand

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Flavor was ten times better than expected, after I had expected it to be good to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Acquaire

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was exactly as ordered, and arrived earlier than expected! I am extremely satisfied with the product and it tastes great as well. I will definitely buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate Coconut such an amazing flavor, I just love it.

customer_reviews.text: I have tried many protien shakes but always come back to this one. Great price and quality.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the product for its price and variety of flavors, fully recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good taste and good quality. It was highly recommended by my good friend and trainer. He said this was the best on the market today.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie48

customer_reviews.title: Better than mint but worse then mocha
customer_reviews.text: Hell yea gainz ! Flavor 8/10 ... Better than mint but worse then mocha
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and timing! If you are looking to purchase some good supplements, you've come to the right place. Got a good price to.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Handal

customer_reviews.title: Duh
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this protein for 2 years now. Love the taste and the results! Definitely the most bang for your buck when it comes to protein!
customer_reviews.author: benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and mixes well!
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein. It taste really good. and mixes with water very well. I do it for the gains and I believe you should too!
customer_reviews.author: Marty Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor
customer_reviews.text: You can actually taste the coconut. Tried mixing with oatmeal but didn't mix very well. Great in shakes or just with water.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Sue Stuard

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder taste great and is a great supplement! Coconut lovers will be satisfied! It tastes like almond joy chocolate!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, but it tastes kind of sweet to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Maria Claro

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I wish they made this in 2# tubs, rather than just 5#ers. It tastes just like an almond joy bar.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mixes well and taste great. This is my goto whey protein. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Erasmo Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate coconut tastes great, blends well. Couldn't be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hellwig

customer_reviews.title: Can barely keep it down.
customer_reviews.text: Got good reviews so I tried it. I can barely keep it down. Maybe it's just me but I have tried better producta
customer_reviews.author: Johan

customer_reviews.title: Whey Good! Ogre Like!
customer_reviews.text: Good product! Come fast to Ogres house! Build mussels! Lift more heavy things! Amazon say Ogre need three more words.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It tastes really good. That's the best shopping experience I ever have.
customer_reviews.author: Junhong Yang

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: the product seams good but it has no big effect on my body, but I think it's my body resistance toward gaining weight.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Questioning whether this protein is genuine or not
customer_reviews.text: I tried to scan the barcode on MyFitnessPal and it says "Invalid barcode" but it doesn't say that for anything else I scan. I tried another scanning app and it couldn't find the info for it either. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are slightly deceptive
customer_reviews.text: I can agree it tastes like the "Mounds" candy bar but for me it's not nearly as strong. There's more chocolate to me than coconut. Mixes well and doesn't hurt my stomach like other people are saying it does. I was thinking the negative reviews stomach hurting is probably because they are lactose intolerant. It's also possible they got a bad batch. I am happy with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: Kind of Expensive
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, so the price is what it is. It's light, but taken with milk, it acts almost like a replacement meal. There are other products out there, but the quality isn't the same. Optimum Nutrition uses quality ingredients. Just add some creatine and BCAA powder to the mix, and you're set.
customer_reviews.author: Paratopia

product_meta.title: Optimum Nutrition Gold Standard 100% Whey Protein Powder, Chocolate Coconut, 5 Pound (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Chocolate Coconut| Size:5 PoundOPTIMUM NUTRITION'S GOLD STANDARD 100% Whey uses pure Whey Protein Isolates as the primary ingredient. Combined with ultra-filtered whey protein concentrate, each serving provides 24 grams of all-whey protein and 5.5 grams of naturally occurring Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAAs) which are prized by athletes for their muscle building qualities. With more than 20 tempting flavors to choose from, ON GOLD STANDARD 100% Whey gives you plenty of ways to keep workout recovery interesting. Search "ON Apparel TRUE STRENGTH" to see our new ON clothing line!
feature_bullets: Packaging May Vary - New look, with the same trusted quality!

GOLD STANDARD 100% WHEY BLEND – 24g blended protein consisting of whey protein isolate, whey protein concentrate, and whey peptides to support lean muscle mass – they don't call it the GOLD STANDARD of quality for nothing
OVER 5G OF BCAAS – help build lean and strong muscles with naturally occurring BCAAs
3-4G CARBS, 1-3G SUGAR, AND 1-1.5G FAT, GLUTEN FREE, No Sucralose in Double Rich Chocolate Flavor
INSTANTIZED – improves mixability to prevent lumps and clumps
BANNED SUBSTANCE TESTED – highest quality control measures so you feel comfortable and safe consuming the product
4 SIZES TO CHOOSE FROM – 1, 2, 5, and 10-pound options available
OVER 20 DECADENT FLAVORS TO CHOOSE FROM
ANY-TIME FORMULA – great before or after exercise, between meals, with a meal, or any time of day where you need extra protein in your nutrition

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
